title: ColorMOTD插件问题
author: fz_ccy
txt_content:
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN [ColorMOTD] 在向客户端发送ping包时出现严重错误!详细信息:
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.google.common.collect.TransformedIterator.next(TransformedIterator.java:48)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at java.util.AbstractCollection.toArray(Unknown Source)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at java.util.Collections$UnmodifiableCollection.toArray(Unknown Source)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer._INVALID_getOnlinePlayers(CraftServer.java:450)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at org.bukkit.Bukkit._INVALID_getOnlinePlayers(Bukkit.java:103)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at net.zhouhaha.colormotd.Listener.replace(Listener.java:103)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at net.zhouhaha.colormotd.Listener$1.onPacketSending(Listener.java:60)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.SortedPacketListenerList.invokeSendingListener(SortedPacketListenerList.java:195)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.SortedPacketListenerList.invokePacketSending(SortedPacketListenerList.java:149)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.PacketFilterManager.handlePacket(PacketFilterManager.java:612)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.PacketFilterManager.invokePacketSending(PacketFilterManager.java:588)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.NettyProtocolInjector.packetQueued(NettyProtocolInjector.java:281)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.NettyProtocolInjector.onPacketSending(NettyProtocolInjector.java:249)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.ChannelInjector.processSending(ChannelInjector.java:319)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.ChannelInjector.encode(ChannelInjector.java:368)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.ChannelInjector$3.encode(ChannelInjector.java:212)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToByteEncoder.write(MessageToByteEncoder.java:111)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.netty.ChannelInjector$3.write(ChannelInjector.java:217)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.invokeWrite(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:644)
02.07 00:42:25 [Server] WARN at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.write(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:698)
02.07 00:42:26 [Multicraft] Skipped 62 lines due to rate limit (30/s)

求解决方法，以上是报错，一报错全服卡，过一会就全部玩家都掉线了，服务器没蹦，在卡的时候，我在后台还可以输入命令！

replies.author: SB22753
replies.txt_content: 你看看前置的版本对了吗?

replies.author: 薛乐仁
replies.txt_content: 请删掉colormotd配置文件的所有关于玩家地理位置、玩家网络运营商的变量，这两个变量就是导致你出现这种情况的原因。
